game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Recover the lost artifact of Azeroth
game.description: An ancient artifact has been stolen by unknown forces. The city of Stormwind has entrusted you to retrieve it. Travel to the designated area and bring back the artifact.

tasks.description: Track down the informant located in the Blue Recluse Tavern. He contains valuable information regarding the artifact's location.

tasks.objective: Travel to the reported artifact's location
tasks.description: Proceed to the coordinates provided by the informant. Be on your guard for any hostile entities.
Retrieve the artifact from within the heart of Blackrock Mountain. The artifact will be heavily guarded. Proceed with caution.
